title: Sigma Xi Associate
description: Sigma Xi was founded at Cornell University by a junior faculty member and a small group of graduate students in 1886 and is one of the oldest and most prestigious honor societies. Membership in Sigma Xi is by invitation only, where members nominate others on the basis of their research achievements or potential.
imagealt: Nathan Aruna Portfolio Sigma Xi Associate

title: Mila AI Project
description: A chance to develop my skills in AI and Machine Learning, working along side some of the best researchers and tech institutions in the world.

title: Regeneron ISEF 2023
description: Each May, more than 1500 students from roughly 70 countries and territories compete in the fair for scholarships, tuition grants, internships, scientific field trips and the grand prizes, including one $75,000 and two $50,000 college scholarships.

title: Quebec Finals 2023
